item.title: Radio
item.description: We’re offline now, come back later, or sign up to be notified. Timetable - December 13th 2023 18:00 - 19:00: DJ Pastilha 10pm driving back home cassette vibes 1/2 of Front Left by the Speaker Genres: carro/chewy/bop 19:00 - 20:00: Accuraat Other half of Front Left by the Speaker Explore sonic realms with Crisp Sandwich featuring a blend of breakbeat, garage, and drum n bass, oscillating between introspective melodies and cerebral, energetic beats.

item.title: About
item.description: “Front Left by the Speaker” is not just a name, but a nod to that intimate corner of every club where sound meets soul. For those who breathe life into every beat and every groove, tapping into the essence of DJing â€“ the stories spun through melodies and rhythms. Not for the applause or the spotlight, but for the sheer love of it. At “Front Left by the Speaker”, we aren’t just creators or curators, but first and foremost, avid consumers and lovers of music.
